io.description: state handler for managing the conversation

continue.description: Continues the response through reprompting | For when you need to do a certain action based on the output of a call

end.description: Terminates response | For when the user's request is satisfied

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Length of time in seconds for which the website led indicator shines

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: RGB color code of the led indicator

check.description: checks the status of a robot

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the robot whose status is prompted
